name: Fumo Stereotype
description:
The game intend to made for low specs and its worth to turn RTX on.

Highly recommend press zoom button before play on website.

How to play is simple. You need to smash only the blue one.

TIP: You can also click multiple time before the fumo get behind the cover!

Game has no sound because your click sounds are enough.

Also hammer stole from Supanat from RSU.

Game made on Unity.
